title: Kaia Gerber, 18, watches Knicks game with rumoured fling Pete Davidson, 25
text:
Kaia Gerber, 18, was spotted enjoying a brunch date with Pete Davidson, 25, last week - hours after he was reportedly seen leaving her apartment.

And the pair did little to dispel speculation about their close friendship when they both attended the New York Knicks game at Madison Square Garden in NYC on Monday evening, despite not being seated together.

Runway model Kaia was accompanied by her dad Rande Gerber, 57, to watch their team beat the Chicago Bulls 105-98, marking their first victory of the season.

Family outing: Kaia Gerber attended the New York Knicks game at Madison Square Garden in NYC on Monday evening, joined by her dad Rande Gerber

Also in attendance: Her rumoured new fling Pete Davidson, 25, was spotted courtside, fuelling speculation about their relationship

The brunette beauty was dressed to impress in an oversized grey blazer teamed with blue jeans.

Kaia completed the look with a black poloneck with red stitching on the collar and sporty white trainers.

She added a feminine twist to her outfit with some choice pieces of jewellery.

Cindy Crawford's daughter and her dad put on an animated display as they watched all the sporting action from their courtside seats.

Menswear inspired: The brunette beauty was dressed to impress in an oversized grey blazer teamed with blue jeans

Lucky mascot: The pair watched their team beat the Chicago Bulls 105-98, marking their first victory of the season

Glamorous: She added a feminine twist to her outfit with some choice pieces of jewellery

Bobby Portis scored a season-high 28 points against his former team, including a go-ahead 3-pointer with 1:47 remaining in the nail-biting game.

Portis hadn't scored in double digits yet in his first season with the Knicks, but brought the team back from an 18-point deficit.

Pete, who was clad in an eye-catching orange jacket, jumped out of his seat in excitement as Portis brought the game home.

The model and comedian were spotted enjoying each other's company at a popular brunch restaurant in New York last Wednesday, with a fan snapping a photo of the meet-up.

Success: Bobby Portis scored a season-high 28 points against his former team, including a go-ahead 3-pointer with 1:47 remaining in the nail-biting game

Superfan: Pete jumped out of his seat in excitement as Portis brought the game home

In high spirits: The Saturday Night Live comedian was enjoying a night off

Also spotted at the game: Former tennis ace John McEnroe was putting on an animated display

The outing came just a few hours after Pete, who split from actress Margaret Qualley a week ago, was photographed walking through a Soho neighborhood, after leaving Gerber's apartment, according to Page Six.

Hours before the brunch Pete was seen walking around Soho after reportedly leaving Kaia's apartment nearby.

A source told Page Six the two are 'just friends' and most likely met in June when Davidson made his runway debut for Alexander Wang, in which Gerber also walked.

Most recently, Davidson had a whirlwind romance with Margaret Qualley, 25, which began in late August. They were spotted at the time holding hands as they strolled through Venice, where Qualley's film Seberg premiered at the Venice Film Festival.

Chic detail: Kaia added a pop of colour to her outfit by carrying a cute red bag

Date? Pete and Kaia were seen chatting over brunch last week, in a photo shared to Instagram by a fan

Although Qualley's actress mom Andie MacDowell recently declined to comment on the breakup, she gave Davidson her seal of approval last month.

'She has a beautiful relationship with him but I don’t want to step on her relationship too much. They have a nice relationship,' she told People.

A source told Us Weekly that the former couple have 'remained friends.'

Before Qualley, he dated Kate Beckinsale, 46, from late January through April.

But his most high-profile relationship was with Ariana Grande, with whom he began dating last May, which resulted in the couple getting engaged the following month.

Their bliss wouldn't last and the couple announced they had split in October. .

Moving on: Although Pete and Margaret Qualley ended things, a source told Us Weekly 'they remain friends'

Calling it quits: Before Qualley, Pete started dating Kate Beckinsale, 46, in late January, calling it quits in April
